Link.cmd:linkURL: http://uri that locates the link target

cmd:linkRelation.cmd:relLabel: text to identify reference relation type
cmd:linkRelation.cmd:relVocabularyURI: http://uri for vocabulary1 in which the relLabel is defined.

cmd:linkRelation.cmd:relLabel: text to identify second reference relation type
cmd:linkRelation.cmd:relVocabularyURI: http://uri for vocabulary for second relLabel

Link.cmd:linkTitle: text to label this link in a UI
Link.cmd:linkContentResourceType: File type (e.g. MIME) for the actual resource content

cmd:linkOverlayAPI.cmd:APILabel: text to identify the overlay API

cmd:linkParameters.cmd:linkParameterLabel: string to display for link parameter1
cmd:linkParameters.cmd:linkParameterURI: identifier for parameter1 from a controlled vocabulary

cmd:linkParameters.cmd:linkParameterLabel: string to display for link parameter2
cmd:linkParameters.cmd:linkParameterURI: identifier for the parameter2 from a controlled vocabulary

Link.cmd:linkDescription: free text description of the target to help UI
